difficulty.description: Difficulty level of the problem/task. Null if not available.

source.description: Source of the problem/task (e.g., stackexchange_codegolf). Null if not available.

domain.description: Domain of the problem/task (e.g., code). Null if not available.

from.description: Indicates who sent the message ('human' or 'gpt').

value.description: The message content. Null if not available.

think.description: The thought process of the GPT model (only present when 'from' is 'gpt'). Null if not available.
